meanings.definition: A group of singers who perform together.
meanings.sent1: The chorussing at the concert sounded beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The school choir is chorussing at the event tonight.
meanings.sent3: The chorussing of birds in the morning made waking up early worth it.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the chorussing voices filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The harmonious chorussing of the singers brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: To sing or perform in unison with others.
meanings.sent1: We were chorussing along with the radio in the car.
meanings.sent2: The crowd started chorussing the popular song at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The kids chorussing their favorite song made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The protesters were chorussing slogans for change.
meanings.sent5: Chorussing together, we created a beautiful melody.

meanings.definition: The part of a song that is repeated after each verse.
meanings.sent1: The catchy chorussing of the song got stuck in my head.
meanings.sent2: The band played the chorussing with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The chorussing of the song was so catchy, I couldn't stop humming it.
meanings.sent4: The chorussing added a memorable touch to the music.
meanings.sent5: The audience eagerly awaited the familiar chorussing of the song.
